name: White Stag Women's Plus Long Sleeve Scoop Neck PJ Set

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Plus Long Sleeve Scoop Neck PJ Set
reviews.reviewText: The material is very soft and they are comfortable. I found the sleeves a little long and the bottoms are larger so would suggest a size smaller unless you like very loose fitting clothes.
reviews.title: Nice pajamas

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Plus Long Sleeve Scoop Neck PJ Set
reviews.reviewText:
This p.j. set is equal to it's cost. THe annoying thing about it is the strips of plastic WalMart puts into the shoulder seams of their garments! WalMart is the only manufacturer I have ever found who does this and I hate it! It is so uncomfortable and causes a constant itch!
Thin fabric more for a light weight fall set certainly not winter.
reviews.title: Plastic in the shoulders

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Plus Long Sleeve Scoop Neck PJ Set
reviews.reviewText: Got this for myself. Very roomy and soft and was delivered very quickly! Will definitely purchase another one.
reviews.title: Great pajama set

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Plus Long Sleeve Scoop Neck PJ Set
reviews.reviewText: These PJ's are great, high quality, washes nicely. I would recommend them to one and all.
reviews.title: Great PJ's

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Plus Long Sleeve Scoop Neck PJ Set
reviews.reviewText: The website shows 100% cotton. When we received them the label indicates 60% Cotton. We ordered 4 but had to return them because they were misrepresented.
reviews.title: Mis-labeled
